name: ONE AIR Diamond Flight Center
about: One Air, located at Malaga International Airport in Spain, is a flight training centre approved by the Spanish Aviation Safety and Security Agency (AESA) and certified by the European Aviation Safety Agency (EASA) as Approved Training Organisation E-ATO 190. Founded in 2010 by commercial pilots and instructors, One Air is dedicated to providing top-end technologies and the highest standards of safety. Our fleet includes modern Diamond, Cirrus, and Tecnam aircraft, equipped with state-of-the-art avionics and glass cockpits. We offer comprehensive training programs, including Multi-Engine Rating, Instrument Rating, and Crew Resource Management, with the added benefit of training at a 24-hour international airport. Our students and instructors are recruited by leading airlines worldwide, and we pride ourselves on a supportive environment and rigorous safety standards, making One Air an ideal place to achieve your aviation goals.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Multi-Pilot License (MPL)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Night Rating
EASA ATPL Ground School"]
